data.message:
Thank all the Veterans for serving .please don't forget the ones that didn't come home 
My uncle was one that didn't come home in 1944

replies.message: Veterans day is personal for me. We need to do more to honor the Veterans
I'm sorry for your loss
Thank you
And many who came home physically really didm't come home mentally
Very true
my uncle was Korea
David Thomas Polan, my grandson is in the Army, what do you mean by doing more than honor? In Orlando, FL there’s a parade downtown with military men and women marching band honoring.
Vincent Giglotti, my grandson and his fiancé are leaving in Feb. to serve 9 months in Korea and has already served one year in Afghanistan.
Sue Downey in my part of Pennsylvania we don't have that. I wish we did
All they have is a small ceremony but here the hollowween and Christmas parad
Parades mean more to the people
Sue Downey  may all the steps they take are guided by divine order🙏
same my uncle. . army, medic detachment, CO. B, 60th infantry, 1st army.. KIA..12/12/44..

I am sorry for your loss 
Mine. US Navy. Machine gunner KIA
cool thing is he was a male nurse in training at a hospital in my county when he was drafted. after the war they built and named a vfw hall amvets post# 18 in memorandom. very much respect.
Cool. I like that
In my county they didn't do anything to honor my uncle or any other veterans
i think if he didn't work at the hospital first it probably wouldn't have happened.

I don't know? 
My county is a country county with no big cities in central Pennsylvania
I'm sorry for your loss  blessing him
Veterans day is for the living veterans.  Memorial day is for the passed.

Veterans day is for all veterans that served our country past and present .living or deceased. How dare you say that to me. My uncle and a lot of other veterans gave their all in wars so you and i and everyone else would and can have the freedom and liberties that we have today and enjoy. Or are you predijust against deceased military personnel that didn't come home. They gave their so we have what we have today. Or maybe you just don't like Polish Americans that you have to insult my deceased uncle and my family
SAD!

Maxine Corbus. Veterans day is for all veterans that served in the past and for those serving now whether they are alive or dead .Peter Rue said veterans day is only for the living military members. Not for the ones that gave their all. I am insulted
Maxine Corbus my parents taught me that on veterans day you honor all veterans past and present whether they are alive or dead
